author: jerenkrantz
msg: Use --tag=XXX for libtool, if it supports it.  Fixes these libtool's errors:
libtool: compile: unable to infer tagged configuration
libtool: compile: specify a tag with `--tag'
(Seen most often with the SWIG or JavaHL bindings.)
(sh_libtool): New helper variable, this is runnable from configure.
(SVN_LT_CCTAG, SVN_LT_CXXTAG): New substitution variables for Makefile.in
(COMPILE_JAVAHL_CXX) = Use LTCXXFLAGS here, it was using LTFLAGS

author: kfogel
msg: (test_list): Skip tab_test if os is not posix.  This is because
on Windows, we cannot create paths containing TABs anyway.

author: maxb
msg: Add a useful script to demangle patches from the svn.haxx.se.mail archives.
usage:   mlpatch.py dev|users year month msgno > foobar.patch
Very annoyingly, the http://svn.haxx.se/ subversion mailing list archives
mangle inline patches, and provide no raw message download facility
(other than for an entire month's email as an mbox).
So, I wrote this script, to demangle them. It's not perfect, as it has to
guess about whitespace, but it does an acceptable job.

author: maxb
msg: Fix issue 2178. Do not special-case, or even comment about, using a GNU m4
extension. Our required version of autoconf requires GNU m4 anyway.
* configure.in: Cut out unneeded checks and comments.

author: sussman
msg: Locking branch:  implement RA->lock() in ra_dav.
Okay, it doesn't actually work yet.  But the code looks complete and
flag from client;  mod_dav_svn sends this header unconditionally.
(request_auth):  maintain a cache of last-fetched-username in ra_session.
(struct lock_request_baton):   new userdata struct for callbacks.
